content.text:
# Draft:Ogun State Traditional Councils

}}
The Ogun State Ministry of Local Government and Chieftaincy Affairs has a list of 77 Yoruba Obas, who are permanent members of the Ogun State Council of Obas.  According to the list, each geopolitical zones of  Egba, Yewa (Egbado), Ijebu, and Remo, has Obas who are permanent members of the council, starting from the four paramount rulers.
For example, there are 19 Obas from Yewa, 20 from Egba, 20 from Ijebu, and 18 from Remo, who are permanent members of the Ogun State Council of Obas. However, other Obas are listed as rotational members, that is, they take turns to be members of the council.
Egba Traditional Council
* Alake & Paramount Ruler of Egba land
* Osile of Oke-Ona.
* Agura of Gbagura.
* Olowu of Owu.
* Olota of Ota.
* Olubara of Ibara.
* Olofin of Isheri.
* Elewo of Ilewo.
* Omola of Imala.
* Onisaga of Isaga.
* Oniro of Iro.
* Onilogbo of Ilogbo.
* Olu of Ifo.
* Onijale of Ijale - Papa
* Olu of Itori.
* Olu of Afowowa Sogade.
* Olu of Orile-Igbore.
* Onikoko of Koko-Ebiye
* Onitele of Itele.
* Olu of Akinale.
Egbado/Yewa Traditional Council
* Olu of Ilaro and Paramount Ruler of Yewa land.
* Onipokia of Ipokia.
* Olofin of Ado-Odo.
* Alaye of Ayetoro.
* Aboro of Ibese.
* Onigua of Eggua.
* Olobi of Ilobi.
* Oloke-Odan of Oke Odan.
* Onimeko of Imeko.
* Olu of Imasayi.
* Oniko of Ikolaje.
* Onidofa of Idofa
* Oniboro of Iboro.
* Abepa of Joga-Orile.
* Oloja of Igbesa.
* Onigbeji of Igbeji.
* Alademeso of Igan-Alade.
* Adokun of Igan-Okoto.
* Ololo of Ijofin.
Ijebu Traditional Council
* Awujale & Paramount Ruler of Ijebu land.
* Dagburewe of Idowa.
* Ajalorun of Ijebu-Ife.
* Orimolusi of Ijebu-Igbo.
* Akija of Ikija-Ijebu.
* Olowu of Owu-Ijebu.
* Ebumawe of Ago-Iwoye.
* Onipe of Ibu-Arijan.
* Alaiye of Odogbolu.
* Oloko of Ijebu-Imushin.
* Moyegeso of Ijebu-Itele.
* Alakan of Ilaka, Aiyepe.
* Limeri of Awa.
* Alaiye Aba, Aiyepe.
* Obiri of Idobiri, Aiyepe.
* Olu of Odosenlu Alaro.
* Oliworo of Iworo.
* Oru of Imoru.
* Gbegande of Ososa.
* Olomu of Omu.
Remo Traditional Council
* Akarigbo & Paramount Ruler of Remo land.
* Elepe of Epe.
* Alaperu of Iperu.
* Ewusi of Makun.
* Ologere of Ogere.
* Odemo of Isara.
* Alaye-Ode of Ode Remo.
* Elemuren of Emuren.
* Odofin of Soyindo.
* Olofin of Ilisan.
* Alakenne of Ikenne.
* Onirolu of Irolu.
* Alara of Ilara.
* Onipara of Ipara.
* Onijagba of Ijagba.
* Lemo of Ode-Remo.
* Alado of Ado, Sagamu.
* Negbuwa of Ibido.
